biotools.summary: content extraction, recognition, and construction system (CERC) is a web-based summarization and visualization tool, CERC (https://newton.isye.gatech.edu/CERC1/), for extracting salient information from clinical and biomedical text. The system ranks sentences by relevance and includes features that can facilitate early detection of medical risks in a clinical setting.
